name: P3D/P5D: Song Season Pass
summary: This season pass entitles you to the add-on tracks for Persona 3: Dancing in Moonlight & Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight. This also includes the Persona Dancing: Persona Cinematic Selection, but not the extra character tracks.

name: P3D/P5D: Accessory Season Pass
summary: This season pass entitles you to the additional cosmetic accessories for Persona 3: Dancing in Moonlight and Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight.

name: P-38 Lightning Tour of Duty
summary: An expansion to Secret Weapons of the Luftwaffe that allows players to fly in, and against, the unique P-38 Lightning. Players assume the role of a P-38 pilot, engaging in a series of historically-inspired missions that showcase the aircraft's diverse capabilities. These likely range from high-altitude interceptions and long-range escort missions to ground attack sorties, reflecting the P-38's real-world adaptability. The game probably features multiple campaign settings, potentially including the Mediterranean, Pacific, and European theaters, where the P-38 saw extensive action. With its emphasis on historical accuracy, P-38 Lightning Tour of Duty offers aviation enthusiasts and World War II buffs an immersive experience that combines realistic flight simulation with the strategic and tactical challenges faced by Allied pilots during the war.

name: P3
summary: P3 is a twin stick shooter released on Xbox Live Indie Games.

name: P3TT
summary: Solve puzzles by creating portals and manipulating time. Inspired by Valve's Portal and Portal 2.

name: P.3
summary: P.3 is a vertical classic arcade shooter with two button controls. Save the space by defeating 5 stages and bosses with variety of weapons and upgrade.

name: P-3 Biotic
summary: P-3 Biotic is an intense twin-stick shooter featuring advanced real-time lighting and gorgeous particle effects. Pilot the MK4s nano-ship inside a petri dish against 14 waves of infectious bacteria as they attempt to destroy the Nucleus, a bio-engineered organism growing at the center of the dish.
